description from knitty com
these hats were made using leftover balls of acrylic yarn in my stash any worsted weight acrylic yarn will work great if you re using leftovers for a two-color hat you will need approximately 150 yds/135m single strand of each color 1 http //www landlust de/index php option=com_docman&task=doc_download&gid=21&itemid=51
